title: First burial in Colombo and Kandy of COVID victims
body_lines: This week saw the first ever burial of Muslim citizen succumbing to COVID-19 at the Maligawatte burial grounds whilst Kandy saw it yesterday.
This is after the Government earlier this month permitted burial or cremation of COVID-19 remains at any cemetery.
Previously burials for COVID remains took place in Oddamavadi, Batticaloa, 300 kilometres away from Colombo.
Prior to March last year, the method of disposal for COVID-19 remains approved in Sri Lanka (by way of cremation) came under heavy criticism.
